channel.title: Removing Items From A Shop!
channel.description: There Is A Load Of Items That I Want To Be Only Admin+ Items But There In A Shop For Like 136 Coins And 1 Coin =S How Do I Change This?

item.title: Removing Items From A Shop!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

You mean changing prices? Go to item(s).cfg, search for the item name with underscores instead of spaces, u will see number like 136.134134134, change that to your desired price like 500.

If you mean deleting items in shops, watch my tutorial in the tutorials section.

Read full topic
